verbs.description: [ARG1: My last conversation with Donald Trump] [V: was] [ARG2: at the New York Military Academy , where we were both cadets] .
My last conversation with Donald Trump was at [ARGM-LOC: the New York Military Academy] , [R-ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG1: we] [V: were] [ARGM-DIS: both] [ARG2: cadets] .
